message.body: Hey. Are you free for a chat?

Basically everything for all my classes is falling apart in some way and I have to redo a lot of work and I'm also getting sick...if we can talk today it will be tonight but I'm sorry right now isn't so great
No worries at all; its not pressing. Is there any I can do to help from afar?
Disclaimer: my life is absurd. I almost cut off my hair in my social psych class.

We were talking about aggression and we got off on a tangent about catharsis. I, of course, spoke up about my hair situation. And my professor challenged me to cut my hair to challenge the existence of catharsis. I didn't end up doing it; I did break a desk though. Anyway, thought it would amuse you
Whattt??? How would that challenge it? And why did you break a desk?
